All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
Represents a parsed user command.
CommandType
Enumerates all supported user command types.
DateTimeUtil
 
Deadline
Represents a task with a deadline.
Event
Represents a task that occurs over a time interval.
Executor
Executes parsed Command objects.
InvalidCommandException
Signals that the user entered an unknown or unsupported command.
InvalidFormatException
Signals that a command was entered with an invalid format.
InvalidTaskNumberException
Signals that the user provided an invalid task number.
NexBot
Entry point of the NexBot application.
NexBotException
Represents the base exception type for all NexBot-related errors.
Parser
Parses raw user input into executable Command objects.
Printer
Handles all user interface output for the NexBot application.
Storage
Handles loading and saving of tasks to persistent storage.
Task
Represents a generic task in the task list.
TaskList
Represents a collection of Task objects.
ToDo
Represents a simple task without any date or time constraint.
